title: Fix non-functional 'Login to Upload' button in Media Library

requirements.summary: Debug and fix the 'Login to Upload' button to trigger Internet Identity authentication flow
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking the 'Login to Upload' button successfully triggers the Internet Identity login flow
After successful authentication, the button changes to show the file upload interface
Error states are handled gracefully with toast notifications
The button remains responsive on mobile devices as shown in the screenshot

file_operations.description: Fix the 'Login to Upload' button onClick handler to properly invoke the login function from the useInternetIdentity hook. Ensure the button correctly triggers authentication when clicked by an unauthenticated user, and verify error handling with toast notifications is in place.

requirements.summary: Verify VideoUpload component properly accesses and invokes the login function from useInternetIdentity hook
acceptanceCriteria: The VideoUpload component correctly imports and uses the useInternetIdentity hook
The login function is properly bound to the button's onClick handler
Console errors related to the authentication flow are resolved

file_operations.description: Review and correct the import and usage of the useInternetIdentity hook. Ensure the login function is properly destructured from the hook and correctly bound to the button's onClick event handler. Add console logging if needed to debug the authentication flow and remove any that block execution.
